525600min 退屈に過ごしてるあなたへ\r\n: To those who are bored for 525,600 min

どーなっちゃうのこの続き！？ まばたき厳禁！\r\n: What's gotta happen next!? Don't blink!

缶バッチずれてない？笑顔忘れてない？\r\n: Is my tin badge crooked? Did I forget to smile?

全世界どこにいたって\r\n: No matter where you are in the whole world

不安いっぱいあっても\r\n: Even if I'm super duper worried
